info.description:
This is the swagger interface for AnsibleForms.
Use the `/auth/login` api with basic authentication to obtain a JWT token.
Then use the access token, prefixed with the word '**Bearer**' to use all other api's.
Note that the access token is limited in time.  You can then either login again and get a new set of tokens or use the `/token` api and the refresh token to obtain a new set (preferred).
info.title: AnsibleForms

tags.name: general settings
tags.description: Get and set general settings and test mail
